short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to download lectures from BruinLearn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download lectures from BruinLearn!
1. Refresh the page
2. Start playing lecture
3. Click on the chrome extension icon & fetch the download link
4. After a few seconds, a download link will be available
5. Right click to save the video!
